Table: table

A table is in a report, and may contain one or more arrays.

table Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
identifier character varying PRIMARY KEY

A desciptive identifier.
chapter.report_identifier#1 report.identifier report_identifier character varying PRIMARY KEY UNIQUE#1

The report.
chapter.identifier#1 chapter_identifier character varying UNIQUE#1

The chapter containing this table.
ordinal character varying UNIQUE#1

The numeric position of this table within a chapter. Must start with a number, may contain numbers, letters, dashes, dots and underscores
title character varying

The title of the table.
caption character varying

The caption for the table.
url character varying

A URL for a landing page for this table.

 

table Constraints
Name Constraint
ck_table_identifier CHECK (((identifier)::text ~ similar_escape('[a-z0-9_-]+'::text, NULL::text)))
table_mostly_numeric_ordinal CHECK (((ordinal)::text ~ '^[0-9]+[0-9a-zA-Z._-]*$'::text))

Tables referencing this one via Foreign Key Constraints:

array_table_map
